name: Email Attachments to S3
description: A basic app that receives Parse Incoming webhooks from Sendgrid and uploads any attachments from the email to a configured S3 bucket.

S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The key for your S3 account.

S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The secret for your S3 account.

S3_BUCKET.description: The bucket in your S3 account to upload attachements to.

S3_BUCKET_PATH.description: The path within in your bucket to upload attachements to.
